name: Golden Yellow Fish Slots Free Play Slot Machine
name_original: Golden Yellow Fish Slots Free Play Slot Machine
description:
Love to play slots? Dive beneath the sea and experience the underwater thrills in this fun slots machine game!

The Golden Yellow Fish Slots is a completely free and addictive slots machine game for your iPhone, iPad, and iPod device.

Main Features:
>Free credits every few hours
>Hit it Rich Lucky bonus games
>Awesome graphics
>Fun like Vegas
>Endless Slot-o-mania entertainment!

Try out this fun and addictive slot machine game without losing any money! This game will keep you playing for hours!
publishers: Fortune Wheel of Slot Machine Games
